pkgmetadata.longdescription: # MenagerieA static site generator that supports:- Markdown- HTML- JSON Schemas (Limited)- XML Schemas- YAML Schemas# DocumentationDocumentation for how to use menagerie is located at [https://bwc9876.github.io/menagerie/](https://bwc9876.github.io/menagerie/)# Contributing To contribute to menagerie, take a look at [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/Bwc9876/menagerie/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md)
